pullrequest.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

content.raw:
I ran the examples_build test on my machine (trusty) and I got build failures for `animated_box`, `arrange`, `listener`, and `publisher`. Is something wrong with my environment or the examples? I can't see the Jenkins output anymore so I don't know how my build differs from CI.

```
/home/jackie/code/gazebo/examples/stand_alone/animated_box/integrated_main.cc:18:41: fatal error: gazebo/transport/transport.hh: No such file or directory
 #include <gazebo/transport/transport.hh>
                                         ^
compilation terminated.
/home/jackie/code/gazebo/examples/stand_alone/animated_box/independent_listener.cc:18:41: fatal error: gazebo/transport/transport.hh: No such file or directory
 #include <gazebo/transport/transport.hh>
                                         ^
compilation terminated.
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/independent_listener.dir/independent_listener.cc.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/independent_listener.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
/home/jackie/code/gazebo/examples/stand_alone/animated_box/animated_box.cc:18:28: fatal error: gazebo/gazebo.hh: No such file or directory
 #include <gazebo/gazebo.hh>
                            ^
compilation terminated.
```

```

make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/independent_listener.dir/all] Error 2
```
